field.name: show_advanced_tab
field.label: Show Advanced Tab
field.description: Show advanced tab, at the top near settings/items/preview tabs where can be edited advanced scripts or styles to be add to the gallery

field.name: include_jquery
field.label: Include jQuery Library
field.description: Add include of jquery js. If you have jquery include in other module, and you don't want to double include, choose 'No'

field.name: js_to_body
field.label: Put JS Includes To Body
field.description: Put the gallery javascript includes to body. This may help in situations when multiple jquery.js libraries are loaded.

field.name: compress_output
field.label: Compress Output
field.description: Sometimes some output filters adds html tags at the html / javascript output. It breaks the gallery from appear. Try this option when you see weird code like output.

field.name: gallery_debug_errors
field.label: Debug Javascript Errors
field.description: show error message when there is some error on the gallery area
